snippet.title: switcher
Mysql Record
Git reset
snippet.content:
$ git reset --hard HEAD (going back to HEAD)
$ git reset --hard HEAD^ (going back to the commit before HEAD) $ git reset --hard HEAD~1 (equivalent to "^")
$ git reset --hard HEAD~2 (going back two commits before HEAD)

snippet.title: Git history
snippet.content:
#default command git log
# Shorter commits tokens git log --abbrev-commit
# compress commits & graph them git log --oneline --graph --decorate
#git commits range git log 8d72572...a41ddf0
#git history range git log --since="1 day ago"
#git hisotry on file git log -- <file_name>
# commit timeline git log --follow -- <file_name>
# commit expend metadata git show <commit-number>

snippet.title: config-user
snippet.content: git config --global user.name <name> git config --global user.email <email>

snippet.title: basics
snippet.content: git branch -a git branch mybranch git branch -m mybranch newbranch git branch -d newbranch
